Uses of Package
org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.firmware

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.firmware 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.firmware  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.firmware  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.magic.binding.handler  
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.firmware used by org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.firmware 
    Class and Description
    Firmware
    The Firmware is the description of a firmware to be installed on the physical device of a Thing.
    FirmwareBuilder
    The builder to create a Firmware.
    FirmwareRestriction
    A function for defining specific installation restrictions for a given Firmware.
    FirmwareUpdateHandler
    The FirmwareUpdateHandler can be implemented and registered as an OSGi service in order to update the firmware for the physical device of a Thing.
    ProgressCallback
    The ProgressCallback is injected into the FirmwareUpdateHandler.updateFirmware(Firmware, ProgressCallback) operation in order to post progress information about the firmware update process.
    ProgressStep
    The ProgressStep enumeration defines the possible progress steps for a firmware update.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.firmware used by org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.firmware 
    Class and Description
    Firmware
    The Firmware is the description of a firmware to be installed on the physical device of a Thing.
    ProgressStep
    The ProgressStep enumeration defines the possible progress steps for a firmware update.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.firmware used by org.eclipse.smarthome.magic.binding.handler 
    Class and Description
    Firmware
    The Firmware is the description of a firmware to be installed on the physical device of a Thing.
    FirmwareUpdateHandler
    The FirmwareUpdateHandler can be implemented and registered as an OSGi service in order to update the firmware for the physical device of a Thing.
    ProgressCallback
    The ProgressCallback is injected into the FirmwareUpdateHandler.updateFirmware(Firmware, ProgressCallback) operation in order to post progress information about the firmware update process.
